Welcome to Dori_Drone_Docs’s documentation!¶

Contents:

  • trying statecharts as devices

This is the microaeth-MA200 driver file Programmer: Lior Segev Date 05 Nov 2020 Version 0.0.1

class aeth_class.AETH(aeth_name='TEstAETH', aeth_port='/dev/ttyUSB0', aeth_location='some_location')¶

The following methods are the actual interface: init_aeth()

check_battery()¶

request battery status

close()¶

closing the the AETH serial port

init_aeth()¶

establish communication with AETH return OK if succedded and -1 if failed

is_sampling()¶

return True if sampling is on going and False otherwise

request_data()¶

request data from aeth. It is currently setup to read in verbose mode and in 5 wavelengths

start_measurement()¶

start measurement - returns True if sampling started

stop_measurement()¶

stop measurement - return True if sampling stopped

update_measurment_ids()¶

update measurements ids by checking status of AETH command: cs udpates state variables firstid = , nextId=, currentId= , sampling = 0 or 1

This is the OPC driver file Programmer: Lior Segev Date 03 September 2020 Version 0.0.1 Based on code by Daniel Jarvis

class opc_class.OPC(opc_name='TEstOPC', opc_port='/dev/ttyACM0', opc_location='some_location')¶

The following methods are the actual interface: init_opc() laz_ctrl(bool) to start or stop the opc lazer fan_ctrl(bool) to start or stop the opc fan read_data() to read data from the opc - returns a dict with all the information

Histdata(ans)¶

function to read all the hist data, to break up the getHist

RHcon(ans)¶

ans is combine_bytes(ans[52],ans[53])

Tempcon(ans)¶

ans is combine_bytes(ans[52],ans[53])

fan_ctrl(ctrl_flag=False)¶

opc fan control by sending true to turn it on and false to turn it off

gain_ctrl(ctrl_flag=False)¶

setting Gain to HIGH or LOW will automatically remove autogain option The instrument will have to be reset for the autogain option to return to its active state

init_opc()¶

establish communication with OPC return OK if succedded and -1 if failed

laz_ctrl(laser_flag=False)¶

opc fan control by sending true to turn it on and false to turn it off

read_data()¶

Read all data from OPC

read_status()¶

reading the status of the following parameters - each parameter is 8 bit unsigned byte Fan_ON LaserDAC_ON FanDACval LaserDACval LaserSwitch Gain and AutoGain Toggle Settings bit0 is Gain (High/Low), bit1 is AutoGain (On/Off)

rightbytes(response)¶

Get ride of the 0x61 byeste responce from the hist data, returning just the wanted data

opc_service.DISABLED(opc, e)¶

Indices and tables¶
